mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT b.basket_idx, b.ingre_idx, i.ingre_img, i.ingre_name, i.ingre_price, b.mem_id, b.ingre_cnt, CASE WHEN a.mem_id IS NOT NULL THEN '알레르기 주의 식품' WHEN d.mem_id IS NOT NULL THEN '비선호 식품' ELSE '일반 식품' END AS ingre_status FROM basket_info b JOIN ingredient_info i ON b.ingre_idx = i.ingre_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mai.mem_id, iai.ingre_idx FROM member_allergy_info mai JOIN ingre_allergy_info iai ON mai.allergy_idx = iai.allergy_idx WHERE mai.mem_id = #{mem_id} ) a ON b.ingre_idx = a.ingre_idx AND b.mem_id = a.mem_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mdi.mem_id, ii.ingre_idx FROM member_dislike_info mdi JOIN ingredient_info ii ON ii.ingre_name LIKE CONCAT('%', (SELECT di.dislike_name FROM dislike_info di WHERE di.dislike_idx = mdi.dislike_idx), '%') WHERE mdi.mem_id = #{mem_id} ) d ON b.ingre_idx = d.ingre_idx AND b.mem_id = d.mem_id WHERE b.mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.delete: delete from basket_info where mem_id = #{mem_id} and ingre_idx = #{ingre_idx}
mapper.update: update basket_info set ingre_cnt = #{ingre_cnt} where basket_idx = #{basket_idx}
